籤詩版本二:
Zvakaoma zvikuru kuvavarira kubudirira, asi mazuva okurwira roorano akabatikana kwechinguvana.
Pakupedzisira achabayiwa nomuseve, uye munhu anokudzwa anotungamirira vanhu vanokudzwa.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram inomiririra chikomborero chakavanza.
Zvese zvakanaka.
解曰: Kuchinja nemaune. Enron pakupedzisira. Kana iwe ukabvunza nezve kushandiswa. Pedyo nevanhu vepamusoro chete.
籤詩故事一:
◇Kurudziro yebhuku Jiang Wei (Rumbidzo yebhuku Jiang Wei)
Jiang Wei (202-264), zita rekuremekedza Boyue, aive chizvarwa cheJi County, Tianshui County, Liangzhou (yava kunzi Gangu County, Tianshui Guta, Gansu Province).
Munguva yeHumambo Hutatu, Kong Ming akatungamira mauto ake kubva kuQishan Mountain katanhatu kunorwisa Cao Wei. Kong Ming airwara zvakanyanya uye akange ari munjodzi. Akadzidzisa zvitsauko makumi maviri nezvina zveBhuku reHondo kune mukuru Jiang Wei, achitarisira kuti aigona kugara nhaka yake.
(Dimikira renyaya iyi nderekuti Jiang Wei akagarwa nhaka nokuda kwechimwe chikonzero)
聖意: Rombo rakanaka remhuri, rombo, bhizinesi, muchato, Liujia, varume vanofamba netsoka havasati vasvika, Tiansi Zhongping, Liu mhuka dzemumba, Zhongping, kutsvaga vanhu, mhosva dzeveruzhinji, kutama kwakakodzera, kurasikirwa pfuma, Zvirwere zvekuMabvazuva, Xingxingshan guva rinotyisa.
古人: Bhuku Rerumbidzo kuna Jiang Wei (Mabhuku kuna Jiang Wei)
